entry.title: Jordan Larsson to Celtic - not happening
entry.summary:
Photo by Vladimir Pesnya/Epsilon/Getty Images
Not one for saying ‘I predicted it’ (Except I am, constantly) but.....I predicted it.
I would be very surprised if we signed Jordan Larsson. Seems so unlikely and based on nothing but the idea that it would be ‘pure class’ but if it happens I will never doubt a Scottish tabloid ever again.— Stevie ⚪️ (@stevieblock102) July 8, 2022
Many got a bit carried away with the initial speculation a few days ago, and that’s really all it was until it was confirmed his agent had stated Celtic were seriously interested in the striker, who is available on a free transfer. However, Anthony “R” Joseph delivered a knockout blow not so long ago.
UPDATE: It's looking increasingly unlikely that Celtic will offer a contract to forward Jordan Larsson. His reps made contact with the Hoops - as well as a number of clubs, including Nottingham Forest.Larsson weighing up options with interest from England, Germany & Italy. https://t.co/Pvgpwar191— Anthony Joseph (@AnthonyRJoseph) July 11, 2022
As expected, it’s almost certain Larsson will not follow in his fathers footsteps and become a Celtic legend, and instead try his luck at one of the bigger leagues in Europe, which was always going to be the case for a player of his quality. So to cheer you up if that’s knocked you for six, here’s Metallica x Celtic to get you going for the season ahead:
For Whom The Bell Tolls & Celtic ParkTogether at last! pic.twitter.com/b2o9SjXknd— GIGPOD ⚪️ (@gigpod) July 11, 2022

entry.title: Celtic not looking to sign Jordan Larsson, according to report
entry.summary: Celtic are not looking to sign Jordan Larsson this summer, according to a report. The Swedish Internationalist is out of contract following his contract with Spartak Moscow being terminated by mutual consent. entry.title: Remembering ‘Goal A Game’ Legend, A Decade After His Passing
entry.summary: On this day, 11 July 2012, Joe McBride tragically passed away after suffering a stroke. Joe signed for Celtic in 1965, fulfilling a boyhood dream as he left Motherwell for £22,000. He was unlucky to miss out on the European Cup Final in Lisbon due to injury, and for that reason he is sadly not Read More

entry.title: Report: Celtic consider Argentinian under-23 internationalist as midfielder hunt continues
entry.summary: Argentinean midfielder Fausto Vera has reportedly been ‘considered’ by the recruitment team at Celtic. The 22-year-old, who currently plays for Primera Division side Argentinos Juniors, was first suggested as a potential Celtic target on social media yesterday. Argentine-based journalist Roy Nemer reported the rumour, stating his intrigue at seeing the Bhoys linked with a move ... entry.title: Report: Celtic 'not looking' to sign Jordan Larsson as transfer stance is revealed
entry.summary: Celtic are reportedly not looking at Swedish striker Jordan Larsson as an option during this summer’s transfer window. The 25-year-old was recently released by Russian side Spartak Moscow and is currently on the lookout for a new club. Of course, the news of Larsson being available on a free transfer brought a lot of fanfare ...
